Title: A Bug's Life
Plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.
Tagline: An epic presentation of miniature proportions.
Writers: John Lasseter, Andrew Stanton, Joe Ranft
Stars: Kevin Spacey, David Foley, Julia Louis-Dreyfus
